<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reaper of Repose](/Feats.aspx?ID=1100) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097); master proficiency in a weapon

</column>

---

Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses. When you make an attack using a weapon with which you have master proficiency and hit an undead creature, you ignore 5 points of the creature’s resistances, and the undead’s weaknesses are 2 higher against your attack.
name: Reaper of Repose
prerequisite: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; master proficiency in a weapon
